mapper.select: select PATIENT_TYPE, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_ID, FILE_NO, DOC_STATUS, INFORMED_CONSENT_NO, PAT_ID_NUMBER, PAT_NAME, DATE_BIRTH, AGE_YEAR, AGE, ORGANIZATION_VIEW, PAT_LEGAL_REP_VIEW, CDA_CODE, SEX_CODE, SEX_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_ID, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_TIME, SURGERY_DR_ID, SURGERY_DR_NAME, SURGERY_DR_TIME, PAT_SIGN_ID, PAT_SIGN_NAME, PAT_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_NAME, LEGAL_REP_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_CODE, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_NAME, BED_ID, BED_NAME, ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, WARD_ID, WARD_NAME, HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, SURGERY_CODE, SURGERY_NAME, SURGERY_TIME, SURGERY_METHOD, SURGERY_READY, SURGERY_TABOO, SURGERY_INDICATION, ANAES_METHOD_CODE, ANAES_METHOD_NAME, REPLACE_OPTIONS, SURGERY_RISK, POC from CDA.CDA_26 where INFORMED_CONSENT_NO = #{informedConsentNo}
mapper.insert: insert into CDA_26(PATIENT_TYPE, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_ID, FILE_NO, DOC_STATUS, PAT_ID_NUMBER, PAT_NAME, DATE_BIRTH, AGE_YEAR, AGE, ORGANIZATION_VIEW, PAT_LEGAL_REP_VIEW, CDA_CODE, SEX_CODE, SEX_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_ID, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_TIME, SURGERY_DR_ID, SURGERY_DR_NAME, SURGERY_DR_TIME, PAT_SIGN_ID, PAT_SIGN_NAME, PAT_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_NAME, LEGAL_REP_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_CODE, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_NAME, BED_ID, BED_NAME, ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, WARD_ID, WARD_NAME, HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, SURGERY_CODE, SURGERY_NAME, SURGERY_TIME, SURGERY_METHOD, SURGERY_READY, SURGERY_TABOO, SURGERY_INDICATION, ANAES_METHOD_CODE, ANAES_METHOD_NAME, REPLACE_OPTIONS, SURGERY_RISK, POC) values (#{patientType}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{fileNo}, #{docStatus}, #{patIdNumber}, #{patName}, #{dateBirth}, #{ageYear}, #{age}, #{organizationView}, #{patLegalRepView}, #{cdaCode}, #{sexCode}, #{sexName}, #{attendingDoctorId}, #{attendingDoctorName}, #{attendingDoctorTime}, #{surgeryDrId}, #{surgeryDrName}, #{surgeryDrTime}, #{patSignId}, #{patSignName}, #{patSignTime}, #{legalRepName}, #{legalRepSignTime}, #{legalRepRelationCode}, #{legalRepRelationName}, #{bedId}, #{bedName}, #{roomId}, #{roomName}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{wardId}, #{wardName}, #{hospitalId}, #{hospitalName}, #{diagnosisCode}, #{diagnosisName}, #{surgeryCode}, #{surgeryName}, #{surgeryTime}, #{surgeryMethod}, #{surgeryReady}, #{surgeryTaboo}, #{surgeryIndication}, #{anaesMethodCode}, #{anaesMethodName}, #{replaceOptions}, #{surgeryRisk}, #{poc})

insert into CDA_26(PATIENT_TYPE, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_ID, FILE_NO, DOC_STATUS, PAT_ID_NUMBER, PAT_NAME, DATE_BIRTH, AGE_YEAR, AGE, ORGANIZATION_VIEW, PAT_LEGAL_REP_VIEW, CDA_CODE, SEX_CODE, SEX_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_ID, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_TIME, SURGERY_DR_ID, SURGERY_DR_NAME, SURGERY_DR_TIME, PAT_SIGN_ID, PAT_SIGN_NAME, PAT_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_NAME, LEGAL_REP_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_CODE, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_NAME, BED_ID, BED_NAME, ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, WARD_ID, WARD_NAME, HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, SURGERY_CODE, SURGERY_NAME, SURGERY_TIME, SURGERY_METHOD, SURGERY_READY, SURGERY_TABOO, SURGERY_INDICATION, ANAES_METHOD_CODE, ANAES_METHOD_NAME, REPLACE_OPTIONS, SURGERY_RISK, POC) values
(#{entity.patientType}, #{entity.patientId}, #{entity.visitId}, #{entity.fileNo}, #{entity.docStatus}, #{entity.patIdNumber}, #{entity.patName}, #{entity.dateBirth}, #{entity.ageYear}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.organizationView}, #{entity.patLegalRepView}, #{entity.cdaCode}, #{entity.sexCode}, #{entity.sexName}, #{entity.attendingDoctorId}, #{entity.attendingDoctorName}, #{entity.attendingDoctorTime}, #{entity.surgeryDrId}, #{entity.surgeryDrName}, #{entity.surgeryDrTime}, #{entity.patSignId}, #{entity.patSignName}, #{entity.patSignTime}, #{entity.legalRepName}, #{entity.legalRepSignTime}, #{entity.legalRepRelationCode}, #{entity.legalRepRelationName}, #{entity.bedId}, #{entity.bedName}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.roomName}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.wardId}, #{entity.wardName}, #{entity.hospitalId}, #{entity.hospitalName}, #{entity.diagnosisCode}, #{entity.diagnosisName}, #{entity.surgeryCode}, #{entity.surgeryName}, #{entity.surgeryTime}, #{entity.surgeryMethod}, #{entity.surgeryReady}, #{entity.surgeryTaboo}, #{entity.surgeryIndication}, #{entity.anaesMethodCode}, #{entity.anaesMethodName}, #{entity.replaceOptions}, #{entity.surgeryRisk}, #{entity.poc})

insert into CDA_26(PATIENT_TYPE, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_ID, FILE_NO, DOC_STATUS, PAT_ID_NUMBER, PAT_NAME, DATE_BIRTH, AGE_YEAR, AGE, ORGANIZATION_VIEW, PAT_LEGAL_REP_VIEW, CDA_CODE, SEX_CODE, SEX_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_ID, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME, ATTENDING_DOCTOR_TIME, SURGERY_DR_ID, SURGERY_DR_NAME, SURGERY_DR_TIME, PAT_SIGN_ID, PAT_SIGN_NAME, PAT_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_NAME, LEGAL_REP_SIGN_TIME, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_CODE, LEGAL_REP_RELATION_NAME, BED_ID, BED_NAME, ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, WARD_ID, WARD_NAME, HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, SURGERY_CODE, SURGERY_NAME, SURGERY_TIME, SURGERY_METHOD, SURGERY_READY, SURGERY_TABOO, SURGERY_INDICATION, ANAES_METHOD_CODE, ANAES_METHOD_NAME, REPLACE_OPTIONS, SURGERY_RISK, POC) values
(#{entity.patientType}, #{entity.patientId}, #{entity.visitId}, #{entity.fileNo}, #{entity.docStatus}, #{entity.patIdNumber}, #{entity.patName}, #{entity.dateBirth}, #{entity.ageYear}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.organizationView}, #{entity.patLegalRepView}, #{entity.cdaCode}, #{entity.sexCode}, #{entity.sexName}, #{entity.attendingDoctorId}, #{entity.attendingDoctorName}, #{entity.attendingDoctorTime}, #{entity.surgeryDrId}, #{entity.surgeryDrName}, #{entity.surgeryDrTime}, #{entity.patSignId}, #{entity.patSignName}, #{entity.patSignTime}, #{entity.legalRepName}, #{entity.legalRepSignTime}, #{entity.legalRepRelationCode}, #{entity.legalRepRelationName}, #{entity.bedId}, #{entity.bedName}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.roomName}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.wardId}, #{entity.wardName}, #{entity.hospitalId}, #{entity.hospitalName}, #{entity.diagnosisCode}, #{entity.diagnosisName}, #{entity.surgeryCode}, #{entity.surgeryName}, #{entity.surgeryTime}, #{entity.surgeryMethod}, #{entity.surgeryReady}, #{entity.surgeryTaboo}, #{entity.surgeryIndication}, #{entity.anaesMethodCode}, #{entity.anaesMethodName}, #{entity.replaceOptions}, #{entity.surgeryRisk}, #{entity.poc})
on duplicate key update PATIENT_TYPE = values(PATIENT_TYPE), PATIENT_ID = values(PATIENT_ID), VISIT_ID = values(VISIT_ID), FILE_NO = values(FILE_NO), DOC_STATUS = values(DOC_STATUS), PAT_ID_NUMBER = values(PAT_ID_NUMBER), PAT_NAME = values(PAT_NAME), DATE_BIRTH = values(DATE_BIRTH), AGE_YEAR = values(AGE_YEAR), AGE = values(AGE), ORGANIZATION_VIEW = values(ORGANIZATION_VIEW), PAT_LEGAL_REP_VIEW = values(PAT_LEGAL_REP_VIEW), CDA_CODE = values(CDA_CODE), SEX_CODE = values(SEX_CODE), SEX_NAME = values(SEX_NAME), ATTENDING_DOCTOR_ID = values(ATTENDING_DOCTOR_ID), ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME = values(ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME), ATTENDING_DOCTOR_TIME = values(ATTENDING_DOCTOR_TIME), SURGERY_DR_ID = values(SURGERY_DR_ID), SURGERY_DR_NAME = values(SURGERY_DR_NAME), SURGERY_DR_TIME = values(SURGERY_DR_TIME), PAT_SIGN_ID = values(PAT_SIGN_ID), PAT_SIGN_NAME = values(PAT_SIGN_NAME), PAT_SIGN_TIME = values(PAT_SIGN_TIME), LEGAL_REP_NAME = values(LEGAL_REP_NAME), LEGAL_REP_SIGN_TIME = values(LEGAL_REP_SIGN_TIME), LEGAL_REP_RELATION_CODE = values(LEGAL_REP_RELATION_CODE), LEGAL_REP_RELATION_NAME = values(LEGAL_REP_RELATION_NAME), BED_ID = values(BED_ID), BED_NAME = values(BED_NAME), ROOM_ID = values(ROOM_ID), ROOM_NAME = values(ROOM_NAME), DEPT_ID = values(DEPT_ID), DEPT_NAME = values(DEPT_NAME), WARD_ID = values(WARD_ID), WARD_NAME = values(WARD_NAME), HOSPITAL_ID = values(HOSPITAL_ID), HOSPITAL_NAME = values(HOSPITAL_NAME), DIAGNOSIS_CODE = values(DIAGNOSIS_CODE), DIAGNOSIS_NAME = values(DIAGNOSIS_NAME), SURGERY_CODE = values(SURGERY_CODE), SURGERY_NAME = values(SURGERY_NAME), SURGERY_TIME = values(SURGERY_TIME), SURGERY_METHOD = values(SURGERY_METHOD), SURGERY_READY = values(SURGERY_READY), SURGERY_TABOO = values(SURGERY_TABOO), SURGERY_INDICATION = values(SURGERY_INDICATION), ANAES_METHOD_CODE = values(ANAES_METHOD_CODE), ANAES_METHOD_NAME = values(ANAES_METHOD_NAME), REPLACE_OPTIONS = values(REPLACE_OPTIONS), SURGERY_RISK = values(SURGERY_RISK), POC = values(POC)
mapper.update:
update CDA_26
PATIENT_TYPE = #{patientType},
PATIENT_ID = #{patientId},
VISIT_ID = #{visitId},
FILE_NO = #{fileNo},
DOC_STATUS = #{docStatus},
PAT_ID_NUMBER = #{patIdNumber},
PAT_NAME = #{patName},
DATE_BIRTH = #{dateBirth},
AGE_YEAR = #{ageYear},
AGE = #{age},
ORGANIZATION_VIEW = #{organizationView},
PAT_LEGAL_REP_VIEW = #{patLegalRepView},
CDA_CODE = #{cdaCode},
SEX_CODE = #{sexCode},
SEX_NAME = #{sexName},
ATTENDING_DOCTOR_ID = #{attendingDoctorId},
ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME = #{attendingDoctorName},
ATTENDING_DOCTOR_TIME = #{attendingDoctorTime},
SURGERY_DR_ID = #{surgeryDrId},
SURGERY_DR_NAME = #{surgeryDrName},
SURGERY_DR_TIME = #{surgeryDrTime},
PAT_SIGN_ID = #{patSignId},
PAT_SIGN_NAME = #{patSignName},
PAT_SIGN_TIME = #{patSignTime},
LEGAL_REP_NAME = #{legalRepName},
LEGAL_REP_SIGN_TIME = #{legalRepSignTime},
LEGAL_REP_RELATION_CODE = #{legalRepRelationCode},
LEGAL_REP_RELATION_NAME = #{legalRepRelationName},
BED_ID = #{bedId},
BED_NAME = #{bedName},
ROOM_ID = #{roomId},
ROOM_NAME = #{roomName},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
DEPT_NAME = #{deptName},
WARD_ID = #{wardId},
WARD_NAME = #{wardName},
HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId},
HOSPITAL_NAME = #{hospitalName},
DIAGNOSIS_CODE = #{diagnosisCode},
DIAGNOSIS_NAME = #{diagnosisName},
SURGERY_CODE = #{surgeryCode},
SURGERY_NAME = #{surgeryName},
SURGERY_TIME = #{surgeryTime},
SURGERY_METHOD = #{surgeryMethod},
SURGERY_READY = #{surgeryReady},
SURGERY_TABOO = #{surgeryTaboo},
SURGERY_INDICATION = #{surgeryIndication},
ANAES_METHOD_CODE = #{anaesMethodCode},
ANAES_METHOD_NAME = #{anaesMethodName},
REPLACE_OPTIONS = #{replaceOptions},
SURGERY_RISK = #{surgeryRisk},
POC = #{poc},
where INFORMED_CONSENT_NO = #{informedConsentNo}
